DOC.brief_summary: A multiple pregnancy undesired outcome assist reproduction . Current embryo selection technology inefficient identify embryo high implantation potential . Time lapse ( TL ) embryo monitor provide additional information embryo development therefore may aid embryo selection . The investigator aim study whether TL monitor superior traditional embryo observation single blastocyst select transfer ( ET ) .
DOC.brief_title: Embryo Selection Time Lapse Monitoring Single Embryo Transfer ( `` SET '' )
DOC.detailed_description: Prospective RCT compare two embryo selection method ( TL algorithm vs standard morphology base ) SET . Infertile couple schedule undergo IVF intracytoplasmic sperm injection ( ICSI ) meet inclusion-exclusion criterion enrol . Randomization Groups 1 2 perform prior start stimulation . Randomization carry block two , select TL control assignment close , opaque envelope . Patients blind allocation . Standard luteal long ( Suprefact , Sanofi Aventis ) flexible gonadotropin-releasing hormone ( GnRH ) antagonist ( Cetrotide , Merck Serono ) protocols recombinant FSH ( Gonal-f , Merck Serono ) use stimulation . Embryos place individual well 9-well Primo Vision culture dish ( Vitrolife AB , Sweden ) day 1 culture , check fertilization . Out incubator handle group ; : day 1 : fertilization check ; day 3 : culture medium change ; day 5 : transfer . On day 3 5 , embryo morphologically assess invert microscope . Embryos TL group image 10-minute interval . The Primo Vision software use analysis TL image . The first appearance 2 , 3 , 4 5 cell stage ( t2 , t3 , t4 t5 , respectively ) annotate . Timing kinetic event calculate time fertilization ( t0 ) . ( TL parameter definition see supplement ) There adjustments kinetic event depend method fertilization . Blastocyst morphology assess use Gardner score . Fragmentation assess reach high grade sequence TL image . Cytoplasmic abnormality ( vacuole ) also record . The TL reference range define fixed start recruitment , Embryos control group select base actual morphology . The primary end point pregnancy rate ( PR ; rise β human chorionic gonadotropin [ hCG ] ) per patient base intention treat . Further endpoint ongoing pregnancy rate ( OPR ; pregnancy progress beyond 12 week gestation ) , pregnancy loss ( loss pregnancy initial rise βhCG 12 week gestation ) , live birth rate ( LBR ) , gestational age ( GA ) delivery birth weight offspring . When calculate sample size assume 13 % increase pregnancy rate expect 42 % 55 % . We plan run study 1:1 ratio group one interim monitor 0.1 information fraction . Using two-sided test Pocock boundary estimation , 282 patient group calculate ( power 80 % , p 5 % ) . Assuming 10 % dropout rate need enroll 620 patient . Based result interim monitoring ( 61 case two arm ) pregnancy rate TL group 15 % high control ( 58.3 % vs. 44.0 % ) . Assuming 58 % pregnancy rate TL group 44 % control , sample size 210 per group , need achieve power 80 % , significance level 5 % . Assuming 10 % dropout rate total sample size 462 patient need . The group compare base maximum likelihood estimation principle . We hypothesize show patient treatment arm similar baseline , average , respect variable might influence outcome . Chi-square test , likelihood-ratio test exact test use analysis categorical variable . Continuous variable compare use independent group t-test . analysis variance . Normality homogeneity variance examine . At interim analysis trial primary endpoint ( pregnancy rate ) TL control group compare Fisher 's exact test . After close trial primary endpoint ( pregnancy rate ) among group compare Fisher 's exact test . Bonferroni correction use p-value end trial . All p-values consider exploratory nature . During analysis extent distribution miss data also examine . No imputation make miss data .
DOC.criteria: Age < 36 yr baseline FSH < 10 IU/l regular 2535 day cycle less 2 previous fail IVF cycle intact uterus indication IVF BMI < 18 < 30 kg/m2 acceptance single embryo transfer PCOS Sperm obtain surgical extraction chromosome abnormality Presence hydrosalpinx stage III/IV endometriosis Less 3 good quality day 3 embryo one good quality day 5 embryos lack consent
